criteria.name: Task Creation
criteria.description: Application allows creating tasks with title, description, and priority

criteria.name: Task Listing
criteria.description: Tasks are displayed in formatted output with filtering options

criteria.name: Task Updates
criteria.description: Tasks can be marked complete and have properties modified
